wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Eccles Aspden (27 December 1880 – 17 February 1959) was an English professional footballer who played as a winger in the Football League for Burnley. He was on the books of Preston North End without appearing for their first team, played Southern League football for Kettering and Brighton & Hove Albion, and was briefly attached to Oldham Athletic.

response: * Tommy Aspden (born 1881, deceased), an English professional footballer.
